name: Ant Quest
description:
2D platform game spotlighting an ant's adventure into a dream world. Downloadable on Mac and Windows. 

Ant Quest is mainly inspired by the theme "dreaming". The intention was to create different worlds or locations that the ant travels to and explores. Each level ends with a door that transports the ant to the next location (or level).  While designing, it ended up being less complicated to have the locations flow together based on their environment and what made the most sense. The project was made to explore the concepts of level design and how to create an interesting game using minimal controls and features. 

Controls: Space to jump (hit multiple times to double/triple jump). Arrows to move the player. 'N' moves on to the next level.

Credits:

Level Design/Game: Sarah Huseth

Code: Provided by the University of Texas at Austin
